execution_plan.description: Retrieve all order items along with their order id and order date (to allow grouping by order).
execution_plan.query: SELECT oi.order_id, o.date_order_placed AS order_date, oi.product_id FROM Order_Items oi JOIN Orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id;

execution_plan.description: Fetch product prices for all product_ids referenced by the order items returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
